metadata.name: AGAINST THE ROPES #1
metadata.description:
This image is one of my favorites of this essay. Many things about it are special. The little boy stood out to me the first time I saw him. He always trained hard, but then, this one time I couldn´t see him, amongst the other athletes, inside the boxing gym. After looking for him for a while, I found him standing in the outside-ring-area in the yard. All by himself, he was all calm, almost like in a meditative state of mind.  
That´s when I could tell, that he was very serious, with his love for boxing.


Leica M10

EDITION: 1/1
